languages.text: Ту битву возглавлял{mf||а} Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус. Волевая личность, непоколебимая. Я был в составе {mf|его|ее} личной гвардии блюстителей — очередной сопляк, считавший себя матерым воякой. Император был милостив, позволив мне осознать, насколько я заблуждался. Большинство моих товарищей не получили такого шанса.

traits.locale_text: Ту битву возглавлял{mf||а} Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус. Волевая личность, непоколебимая. Я был в составе {mf|его|ее} личной гвардии блюстителей — очередной сопляк, считавший себя матерым воякой. Император был милостив, позволив мне осознать, насколько я заблуждался. Большинство моих товарищей не получили такого шанса.

languages.text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.

I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. languages.text: 行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是这场战争的最高指挥官。这个人拥有钢铁般的意志，坚定不移，绝不动摇。那个时候，我还在{mf|他|她}的私人执法卫队中服役。那时的我仅仅是个狂妄的小伙子，自以为是战场上的专家。不过，帝皇对我很仁慈，祂给了我一个机会，让我意识到我错得究竟有多么离谱。我绝大部分战友都没有这样的机会。
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是这场战争的最高指挥官。这个人拥有钢铁般的意志，坚定不移，绝不动摇。那个时候，我还在{mf|他|她}的私人执法卫队中服役。那时的我仅仅是个狂妄的小伙子，自以为是战场上的专家。不过，帝皇对我很仁慈，祂给了我一个机会，让我意识到我错得究竟有多么离谱。我绝大部分战友都没有这样的机会。

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius était {mf|le commandant|la commandante} en chef de cette bataille. {mf|Un homme|Une femme} à la volonté de fer, infatigable et inébranlable. À l'époque, je servais dans sa garde personnelle de prévôts, mais je n'étais encore qu'un gamin prétentieux qui se prenait pour un combattant aguerri. Heureusement, l'Empereur m'avait à la bonne et Il m'a laissé une chance de comprendre toute l'étendue de mon erreur. La plupart de mes compagnons d'armes ne peuvent pas en dire autant.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.

À l'époque, je servais dans sa garde personnelle de prévôts, mais je n'étais encore qu'un gamin prétentieux qui se prenait pour un combattant aguerri. Heureusement, l'Empereur m'avait à la bonne et Il m'a laissé une chance de comprendre toute l'étendue de mon erreur. La plupart de mes compagnons d'armes ne peuvent pas en dire autant.

languages.text: 自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはその戦いの最高指揮官だった。鉄の意志の持ち主。ひるまず、揺るがない。私は当時、{mf|彼|女}の個人的なエンフォーサーとして仕えており、自分を最高の兵士だと思い込む生意気な若造だった。皇帝は私に寛大で、自分がいかに間違っていたかを思い知る機会を与えてくれた。ほとんどの仲間はそんな機会を得られなかった。
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはその戦いの最高指揮官だった。鉄の意志の持ち主。ひるまず、揺るがない。私は当時、{mf|彼|女}の個人的なエンフォーサーとして仕えており、自分を最高の兵士だと思い込む生意気な若造だった。皇帝は私に寛大で、自分がいかに間違っていたかを思い知る機会を与えてくれた。ほとんどの仲間はそんな機会を得られなかった。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente {name} fue nuestr{mf|o|a} comandante suprem{mf|o|a}. Era un{mf| hombre|a mujer} de voluntad férrea. Incansable e implacable. En aquel entonces serví en su guardia personal. Solo era otro mequetrefe que se las daba de soldado experto. El Emperador tuvo la misericordia de concederme una oportunidad para ver lo equivocado que estaba. Muchos de mis camaradas no llegaron a tenerla.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente {name} fue nuestr{mf|o|a} comandante suprem{mf|o|a}. Era un{mf| hombre|a mujer} de voluntad férrea. Incansable e implacable. En aquel entonces serví en su guardia personal. Solo era otro mequetrefe que se las daba de soldado experto. El Emperador tuvo la misericordia de concederme una oportunidad para ver lo equivocado que estaba. Muchos de mis camaradas no llegaron a tenerla.

languages.text: {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius war in dieser Schlacht {mf|der Oberkommandant|die Oberkommandantin}. {mf|Ein Mann|Eine Frau} von eisernem Willen. Unbeugsam, unerschütterlich. Ich war damals Teil {mf|seiner|ihrer} persönlichen Enforcer-Garde, eines von vielen arroganten Kindern, das sich für einen erfahrenen Soldaten hielt. Der Imperator war gütig zu mir, er gab mir die Chance, zu erkennen, wie sehr ich mich täuschte. Die meisten meiner Kameraden bekamen diese Chance nicht.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius war in diesem Schlacht {mf|der Oberkommandant|die Oberkommandantin}. {mf|Ein Mann|Eine Frau} von eisernem Willen. Unbeugsam, unerschütterlich. Ich war damals Teil {mf|seiner|ihrer} persönlichen Enforcer-Garde, eines von vielen arrognten Kindern, das sich für einen erfahrenen Soldaten hielt. Der Imperator war gütig zu mir, er gab mir die Chance, zu erkennen, wie sehr ich mich täuschte. Die meisten meiner Kameraden bekamen diese Chance nicht.

languages.text: Bu çatışmadaki başkomutan, demir gibi iradesiyle Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'tu. Asla yılmadı, sarsılmadı. Hür Tacir'in şahsi infazcı muhafızlarından biri olarak görev yapıyordum. Uzman bir asker olduğunu düşünen, kibirli veledin tekiydim. İmparator yüzüme baktı resmen, ne kadar hatalı olduğumu görme imkânı sundu. Yoldaşlarımın çoğu benim kadar şanslı değildi.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius was the supreme commander in that battle. A {mf|man|woman} of iron will. Unfaltering, unshakeable. I served in {mf|his|her} personal enforcer guard back then, just another cocky kid who thought he was an expert soldier. The Emperor was gracious to me, He gave me a chance to realise just how wrong I was. Most of my comrades didn't get a chance like that.
